abstract: Elevation Partners, the private equity firm, has ponied up $120 million to buy five million shares in Facebook on the secondary market, TechCruch reported.
snippet: Elevation Partners, the private equity firm, has ponied up $120 million to buy five million shares in Facebook on the secondary market, TechCruch reported.
lead_paragraph: Elevation Partners, the private equity firm, has ponied up $120 million to buy five million shares in Facebook on the secondary market, TechCruch reported, citing a recent letter to its limited partners.

headline.main: Elevation Said to Raise Facebook Stake
